effect.shortEffect: Increases Speed to 1.5× with a major status ailment.
effect.full: Whenever this Pokémon has a major status ailment, it has 1.5× its Speed. This Pokémon is not affected by the usual Speed cut from paralysis. Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is halved.

description.diamond-pearl: Boosts Speed if there is a status problem.
description.platinum: Boosts Speed if there is a status problem.
